name: orliesaurus.github.io
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub page.
I am moving some work I've hosted on BitBucket over here.
That's work in progress...

### About me
I am a keen software developer who likes APIs a whole lot -  I often go to hackathons during weekends to release my inner passion for new ideas and quick code writing/prototyping. Occasionally watch sport on TV, but only if it's a major event.


### What I do
A lot of people have been asking me this question. What's my day job? What do I do? 
* I write code (js/python/php) and consume APIs like oxygen. I am also fascinated by complex CSS code :>
* I enjoy using SaaS products. I work in the SaaS industry. Usually that means I'm a keen reader and you could find me at dev.yourproduct.com 
* I like to attend and organise technology focused meetups. Meeting like minded people over a drink is great
* Networking runs this world, rest assured that if I know someone that I believe you should meet I'll be introducing you

### What else do I do
* I love to keep up with all the latest trends of technology. Software, Hardware, Security, Gossip.
* I tweet a lot
* Oldschool Videogames
* Cooking - traditional food is a passion of mine
* Music, more music, Guitars.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
